#Text=Basketball : Lakers score 102 to defeat the Celtics in Game 1 of the 2010 NBA Finals
#Text=June 3 , 2010
#Text=9:00 p.m. EST
#Text=Report
#Text=Los Angeles Lakers 102 , Boston Celtics 89
#Text=Staples Center , Los Angeles , California
#Text=Attendance : 18,997
#Text=Referees : Joe Crawford , Joe DeRosa , and Derrick Stafford
#Text=ABC Scoring by quarter :
#Text=Pts : Bryant ( 30 ) , Gasol ( 23 ) , Artest ( 15 )
#Text=Rebs : Gasol ( 14 ) , Bryant ( 7 ) , Bynum ( 6 )
#Text=Asts : Bryant ( 6 ) , Gasol and Fisher ( 3 )
#Text=Pts : Pierce ( 24 ) , Garnett ( 16 ) , Rondo ( 13 )
#Text=Rebs : Pierce ( 9 ) , Rondo ( 6 ) , Garnett and Wallace ( 4 )
#Text=Asts : Rondo ( 8 ) , Pierce and Wallace ( 4 )
#Text=Los Angeles leads , 1 – 0
#Text=Friday , June 4 , 2010

#Text=In basketball , Kobe Bryant hit a three-pointer late in the fourth quarter to lift the Los Angeles Lakers to a 102 – 89 victory over the Boston Celtics in Game 1 of the 2010 NBA Finals Thursday night in Los Angeles , California .
#Text=Bryant scored 30 points in the game to lead all scorers .
#Text=Kobe Bryant scored 30 points in Game 1 of the 2010 NBA Finals .
#Text=Bryant was backed-up by a 23-point , 14-rebound effort from Pau Gosol and 15 points from Ron Artest .
#Text=For Boston , Paul Pierce had 24 points and Kevin Garnett had 16 points .
#Text=" They were the more physical team by far , " Celtics coach Doc Rivers said after the game , according to the Associated Press .
#Text=" They were more aggressive .

#Text=When I look up and we 've given up 100 points , I have n't seen that in a while .

column1: #Text=" We felt like we could have stretched the game a bit more . "
#Text=In the third quarter , the Lakers continued to pull away from the Celtics , outpacing them by 11 points .
#Text=With 28 seconds left in the quarter , Artest hit a three-pointer to put Los Angeles up 84 – 64 .
#Text=Bryant had 14 points in the quarter .
#Text=In the fourth quarter , Los Angeles could not extend their lead and in the first four minutes Boston went on a 10-3 run to close the gap to 13 points .
#Text=Both team scored two more points before Gosol slammed home what turned out to be the game-winning points with 6:20 left to put the Lakers up 91 – 76 .
#Text=In the final six minutes , Boston outscored the Lakers 13 – 11 , but it was not enough to bring the game back to single digits .
#Text=Both Pierce and Ray Allen fouled-out for the Celtics .
#Text=Odam fouled-out for Los Angeles .
#Text=This series is the 12th between the two franchises , dating back to 1959 , with the Celtics leading the series 9 – 2 .
#Text=The Minneapolis Lakers first appeared in the Basketball Association of America — the precursor to the NBA — defeating the Washington Capitols 4 – 2 .
#Text=The next year , Minneapolis defeated Syracuse Nationals 4 – 2 in the first NBA .
#Text=The Celtics first played in the NBA finals in 1957 , defeating the St. Louis Hawks 4 – 3 .
#Text=In 1959 , the Lakers and Celtics first faced each other in the Finals .
#Text=The Celtics won the series 4 – 0 .
#Text=In 1962 , the Lakers — now in Los Angeles — met for the second time — this time winning 4 – 3 .
#Text=It was not until the eighth meeting — in 1985 — did the Lakers win .
#Text=Before the start of the game , NBA Commisioner David Stern commented on the historic rivalry .

#Text=" When I first became commissioner in the ' 80s , " Stern told the Los Angeles Times , " I thought what you did every June is you went from L.A. to Boston and back again , and it was interesting to watch .
